animeTitle: Matsue Kankou Taishi Sanri ga Iku! Matsue Ghost Tour
animeDescription: An accompaniment to Heisei Matsue Kaidan: Ayashi. This ghost tour takes a more realistic approach featuring Yoshia (the fictional Eagle Talon character), Kihara Hirokatsu (horror and mystery novelist), Chafurin (voice actor and Shimae Prefecture ambassador), and Frogman (Ryou Ono's caricature; real-life director of the anime studio DLE). The quartet travels around Matsue City exploring horror/haunted real life locations talking about the history and how it became a paranormal focus.The end of the episode promotes ticket sale and times for a real ghost tour watchers can partake in.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume Gaiden: Mukashi no Yoshida-kun', 'Other: Heisei Matsue Kaidan: Ayashi']
